instructions_block.text_input: Devise an inspiration for today’s art theme. It is {{ now().strftime('%-d %B') }}. If this date is **recognised in London or the UK for a holiday or historic event** (e.g. Christmas Day, New Year’s Day, VE Day), you may draw on that connection; otherwise, choose a fresh, creative, intriguing, or whimsical idea that lends itself to visual storytelling.{% if inspiration_history and inspiration_history[-7:] %} Avoid repeating any of the recent themes: {{ (inspiration_history | map(attribute='outputs') | map(attribute='Inspiration') | select | list)[-7:] }}.{% endif %}

vars.a_theme: Shadows as echoes — the play of light leaving transient imprints of solid forms
vars.b_theme: Masks as vessels — capturing histories and personas through their design
vars.style: Caravaggio-inspired chiaroscuro painting, emphasizing the dramatic interplay between light and darkness
vars.guidance: Connect the themes by selecting diverse masks that embody distinct cultures or histories, and use strong contrasts to illuminate the transient nature of shadows, ensuring each shadow form and mask is unique from past imagery.

outputs.a_theme: Music of Forgotten Places
outputs.b_theme: Dances of Abandoned Machines
outputs.style: Metropolitan minimalism reminiscent of Giorgio Morandi’s still lifes
outputs.guidance: Highlight distinct abandoned or forgotten urban environments, portraying them either as silent witnesses to past musical performances or as sites of mechanical dance. Use Morandi's minimalist approach to emphasize stark contrasts and poetic stillness, ensuring each image captures a unique scene, informed by image history for originality.
